products.name: Foaming Facial Cleanser
products.description: Gentle gel cleanser with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide. Deeply cleanses normal to oily skin, removing oil, dirt, and makeup without harming the barrier.

products.name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
products.description: Lotion-like, non-foaming cleanser for normal to dry skin. Ceramides and hyaluronic acid restore the barrier and lock in moisture.

products.name: Moisturizing Cream
products.description: Rich, velvety cream for face and body with 24-hour hydration for dry to very dry skin. Three ceramides plus MVE Technology restore the barrier.

products.name: AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30
products.description: Oil-free daily lotion with broad-spectrum SPF 30. Ceramides support the barrier and hyaluronic acid hydrates.

products.name: PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion
products.description: Ultra-light night lotion with ceramides and niacinamide that hydrates and repairs overnight.

products.name: Resurfacing Retinol Serum
products.description: Retinol serum with encapsulated retinol, licorice extract, and ceramides for texture smoothing and brightening.

products.name: Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum
products.description: Brightening serum with vitamin C and ceramide complex to even tone and enhance radiance.

products.name: Eye Repair Cream
products.description: Hydrating eye cream with botanical complex to reduce dark circles and puffiness.

products.name: Renewing SA Cleanser
products.description: Exfoliating gel with salicylic acid and ceramides to gently smooth and cleanse.

products.name: Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Cleanser
products.description: Creamy, soap-free cleanser with thermal water and ceramides for sensitive skin.

products.name: Anthelios Ultra-Light Fluid Face Sunscreen SPF 60
products.description: High UVA/UVB protection in a lightweight, non-greasy formula.

products.name: Effaclar Duo Dual Acne Treatment
products.description: Spot treatment with benzoyl peroxide and lipo-hydroxy acid for acne-prone skin.

products.name: Aqualia Thermal Rich Cream
products.description: Nourishing cream for dry, sensitive skin with thermal water and hyaluronic acid.

products.name: Elvive Total Repair 5 Shampoo
products.description: Repairing shampoo for damaged hair with protein and ceramide complex.

products.name: Excellence Crème Hair Color
products.description: Triple care color cream with pro-keratin complex for gray coverage.

products.name: Fructis Sleek & Shine Shampoo
products.description: Smoothing shampoo to tame frizz and add shine.

products.name: Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation
products.description: Matte-finish foundation that minimizes pores for normal to oily skin.

products.name: Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation
products.description: Longwear foundation with buildable full coverage and natural matte finish.

products.name: SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water
products.description: All-in-one micellar water that removes dirt, oil, and makeup without rinsing.

products.name: All Soft Conditioner
products.description: Moisturizing conditioner with argan oil and moisture complex for dry, brittle hair.

products.name: Nutritive Bain Satin 1 Shampoo
products.description: Nourishing shampoo enriched with proteins for normal to slightly dry hair.

products.name: Naked Eyeshadow Palette (Original)
products.description: 12-shade neutral eyeshadow palette with matte, satin, and metallic finishes.

products.name: Excellence Crème Permanent Hair Color
products.description: Triple care hair color with pro-keratin complex for nourishing, long-lasting color.

products.name: Elnett Satin Hairspray
products.description: Classic hairspray offering extra-strong, brushable hold with a fine mist.

products.name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum
products.description: Floral-gourmand fragrance featuring iris, jasmine, and patchouli for an elegant scent.

products.name: RevitaLift Triple Power SPF 30 Sunscreen
products.description: Anti-aging sunscreen boosted with pro-retinol, vitamin C, and hyaluronic acid.
